scripts.copy-files: cp service-worker.js dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'service-worker.js copied' && cp manifest.json dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'manifest.json copied' && cp browserconfig.xml dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'browserconfig.xml copied' && cp _redirects dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo '_redirects copied' && cp _headers dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo '_headers copied' && cp -r assets dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'assets copied'
